greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of squares of unitary divisors of n.
comment: Also sum of unitary divisors of n^2. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Nov 13 2001
If b(n,k)=sum of k-th powers of unitary divisors of n then b(n,k) is multiplicative with b(p^e,k)=p^(k*e)+1. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Nov 13 2001
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Unitary Divisor Function.
formula: Dirichlet g.f.: zeta(s)*zeta(s-2)/zeta(2*s-2). - _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 04 2011
Sum_{k=1..n} a(k) ~ 30 * Zeta(3) * n^3 / Pi^4. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 11 2019
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{d = Divisors@ n}, Plus @@ (Select[d, GCD[#, n/#] == 1 &]^2)]; Array[f, 50] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Mar 04 2011 *)
f[p_, e_] := p^(2*e)+1; a[1] = 1; a[n_] := Times @@ f @@@ FactorInteger[n]; Array[a, 100] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Sep 14 2020 *)
program: A034676_vec(70) ; /* via D.g.f., _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 05 2011 */
results.author: _Erich Friedman_
